p: AC has received honoraria from AbbVie, BMS, Gilead, Janssen-Cilag, MSD and Viiv and he is currently receiving research grants from BMS, Gilead and Viiv. GDP and SB have received honoraria from AbbVie, BMS, Gilead, Janssen-Cilag, MSD and Viiv. The remaining authors report no conflicts of interest relevant to this letter.
